title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1760.1 - Introduction
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1760.1 - Introduction

State Regulations

With the consent of the division, a housing company may
satisfy its existing mortgage and enter into a new State-aided or private
mortgage, and thereafter continue under the Mitchell-Lama program. Such
refinance may be in connection with a redevelopment plan under which the
housing company enters into multiple regulatory agreements with the division
and other agencies under a variety of subsidy programs to raise capital for
rehabilitation work and to help maintain the premises as safe, decent, and
affordable housing. When a refinancing is part of a redevelopment plan that
involves more than one governmental agency with supervisory authority, some of
the requirements of this Part may be eliminated pursuant to section
1700.6
of this

Chapter. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
1760.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
